title: Club/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Club "Club")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| ) [![Club.png](/images/5/50/Club.png)](/wiki/File:Club.png) |                                                                                              |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 名称                                                          | 棍棒                                                                                           |
| 外观                                                          | 棍棒                                                                                           |
| 伤害（小型）                                                      | 1d6                                                                                          |
| 伤害（大型）                                                      | 1d3                                                                                          |
| 命中修正                                                        | +0                                                                                           |
| 武器技能类别                                                      | [棍棒](/wiki/%E6%A3%8D%E6%A3%92 "棍棒")                                                          |
| 规格                                                          | [单手](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%95%E6%89%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "单手 (page does not exist)") |
| 基础价                                                         | 3 [zm](/wiki/Zm/zh-CN "Zm/zh-CN") （+10/正数附魔等级）                                               |
| 重量                                                          | [30](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)") |
| 材料                                                          | [木头](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木头 (page does not exist)") |

**棍棒**（club）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它由[木头](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木头 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 棍棒技能](#.E6.A3.8D.E6.A3.92.E6.8A.80.E8.83.BD)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.3 NetHack Fourk](#NetHack_Fourk)
  - [5.4 xNetHack](#xNetHack)
  - [5.5 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [5.6 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.7 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [5.8 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

棍棒在随机生成武器中占比1.2%。

[穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")会在游戏开始时获得一把[+1](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")棍棒[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[食人魔](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E4%BA%BA%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食人魔（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")类怪物生成时有概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一把棍棒：[食人魔](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E4%BA%BA%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食人魔 (page does not exist)")为11⁄12，[食人魔领主](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E4%BA%BA%E9%AD%94%E9%A2%86%E4%B8%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食人魔领主 (page does not exist)")为5⁄6，[食人魔王](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E4%BA%BA%E9%AD%94%E7%8E%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食人魔王 (page does not exist)")为2⁄3[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。[吉斯通警察](/index.php?title=%E5%90%89%E6%96%AF%E9%80%9A%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "吉斯通警察（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")类怪物有1⁄6在生成时获得棍棒[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。[双头巨人](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E5%A4%B4%E5%B7%A8%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双头巨人 (page does not exist)")生成时总是携带棍棒[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

所有[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有约1%的概率获得棍棒作为起始武器。[穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的玩家怪物有1⁄8的概率在生成时获得棍棒[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit 20cbadc](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e)，现在[萨满卡诺夫](/index.php?title=%E8%90%A8%E6%BB%A1%E5%8D%A1%E8%AF%BA%E5%A4%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "萨满卡诺夫 (page does not exist)")会在生成时获得一把+5棍棒。

根据[commit e5c73d0](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/e5c73d01fefff13d49d9af83a52615dfe20e2699)，现在[木魔像](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E9%AD%94%E5%83%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木魔像 (page does not exist)")的[死亡掉落](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E6%8E%89%E8%90%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "死亡掉落 (page does not exist)")中可能会出现棍棒。

## 棍棒技能

| 棍棒   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| 基础   | - [骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| 熟练   | * [考古学家](/index.php?title=%E8%80%83%E5%8F%A4%E5%AD%A6%E5%AE%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "考古学家 (page does not exist)")、[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")、[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")、[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)") |
| 老练   | - [穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |

棍棒和[链棒](/wiki/%E9%93%BE%E6%A3%92 "链棒")使用棍棒技能。游戏中不存在[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类棍棒。

棍棒技能是唯一一种[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")职业的角色不能锻炼的技能。

## 策略

棍棒对于穴居人是不错的前期武器，但游戏中有不少攻击性能比棍棒强得多的武器可以选择。值得注意的是，链棒虽然和棍棒攻击力相同，但是能够进行远程攻击，而且掷出后可以自动返回，因此能够取代诸如[投石器](/wiki/%E6%8A%95%E7%9F%B3%E5%99%A8 "投石器")之类的远程武器，甚至可以在获得神器之前作为主武器使用。

## 历史

棍棒最初于[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Club/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants give player [gnomes](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)") an increased skill cap with clubs, due to their perceived affinity with the aklys. Specific variants based on [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3") and earlier versions may not include the ability to tether an aklys and use it as a long-range weapon introduced in [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1").

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") adds two new items that use the club skill: the [baseball bat](/wiki/Baseball_bat "Baseball bat") and the [torch](/wiki/Torch "Torch").

A club can be [upgraded](/wiki/Upgraded "Upgraded") into an aklys, and vice versa; SLASH'EM does not alter the aklys from NetHack 3.4.3.

The club skill is considerably more useful in SLASH'EM due to the addition of two endgame-quality [artifacts](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") that use it:

- [Skullcrusher](/wiki/Skullcrusher "Skullcrusher") is a lawful artifact club that serves as the guaranteed first [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") for Cavepeople, and does a flat +10 damage to all monsters.
- The [Bat from Hell](/wiki/Bat_from_Hell "Bat from Hell") is a chaotic artifact baseball bat that serves as the guaranteed first for [Rogues](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue"), and does a flat +20 damage against all monsters.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), all player [dwarves](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)") begin the game with a wooden club that [staves](/wiki/Stave "Stave") can be carved into, as well as a [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife") to carve with. Clubs can also be used to make torches by [dipping](/wiki/Dip "Dip") them into a [potion of oil](/wiki/Potion_of_oil "Potion of oil").

[Living lecterns](/wiki/Living_lectern "Living lectern") leave behind 2-6 clubs as part of their special death drop instead of a corpse.

### NetHack Fourk

In [NetHack Fourk](/wiki/NetHack_Fourk "NetHack Fourk"), player gnomes have increased skill caps in clubs.

The [Big Stick](/wiki/Big_Stick "Big Stick") is a chaotic artifact club that replaces [The Sceptre of Might](/wiki/The_Sceptre_of_Might "The Sceptre of Might") as the Caveman [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact").

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), the Big Stick also replaces The Sceptre of Might as the Caveman quest artifact.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a club can be combined with a [rubber hose](/wiki/Rubber_hose "Rubber hose") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a baseball bat.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), Keolewa is a neutral artifact club that acts as the first sacrifice gift artifact for Cavepeople.

A club can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining 2 [arrows](/wiki/Arrow "Arrow") and 2 [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt"). A club can be used to forge a couple of items:

- A club can be combined with a [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") to create a [mace](/wiki/Mace "Mace").
- A club can be combined with a [flail](/wiki/Flail "Flail") to create an akyls.

Player [giants](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") wielding a club have a chance of [stunning](/wiki/Stun "Stun") any monsters they hit with it.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, the [metal club](/wiki/Metal_club "Metal club") is a new weapon that uses the club skill, and deals the most damage among non-artifact clubs.

[Petslayer](/index.php?title=Petslayer\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Petslayer (page does not exist)") is a chaotic artifact club that has +5 to-hit and deals +10 damage against [domestic animals](/wiki/Domestic_animal "Domestic animal").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), Skullcrusher and the Bat from Hell from SLASH'EM appear as artifacts along with Keolewa from EvilHack.

A club can be upgraded into an aklys and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM. Clubs can also be dipped in oil to make torches, as in dNetHack.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 52](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L52)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 433](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L433)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 389](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L389)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 185](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L185)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 183](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L183)

Club/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Club
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
)
名称 棍棒
外观 棍棒
伤害（小型） 1d6
伤害（大型） 1d3
命中修正 +0
武器技能类别 棍棒
规格 单手
基础价 3 zm
（+10/正数附魔等级）
重量 30
材料 木头

棍棒（club）是NetHack中的一种武器。它由木头制成。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 棍棒技能
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 dNetHack
    • 5.3 NetHack Fourk
    • 5.4 xNetHack
    • 5.5 SpliceHack
    • 5.6 EvilHack
    • 5.7 SlashTHEM
    • 5.8 Hack'EM
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

棍棒在随机生成武器中占比1.2%。

穴居人会在游戏开始时获得一把+1棍棒[1]。

食人魔类怪物生成时有概率获得一把棍棒：食人魔为11⁄12，食人魔领主为5⁄6，食人魔王为2⁄3[2]。吉斯通警察类怪物有1⁄6在生成时获得棍棒[3]。双头巨人生成时总是携带棍棒[4]。

所有玩家怪物有约1%的概率获得棍棒作为起始武器。穴居人职业的玩家怪物有1⁄8的概率在生成时获得棍棒[5]。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

根据commit 20cbadc，现在萨满卡诺夫会在生成时获得一把+5棍棒。

根据commit e5c73d0，现在木魔像的死亡掉落中可能会出现棍棒。

棍棒技能

棍棒
最大等级 角色
基础
  • 骑士
熟练
  • 考古学家、野蛮人、医生、盗贼、巫师
老练
  • 穴居人、牧师

棍棒和链棒使用棍棒技能。游戏中不存在神器类棍棒。

棍棒技能是唯一一种游客职业的角色不能锻炼的技能。

策略

棍棒对于穴居人是不错的前期武器，但游戏中有不少攻击性能比棍棒强得多的武器可以选择。值得注意的是，链棒虽然和棍棒攻击力相同，但是能够进行远程攻击，而且掷出后可以自动返回，因此能够取代诸如投石器之类的远程武器，甚至可以在获得神器之前作为主武器使用。

历史

棍棒最初于NetHack 1.3d加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

Some variants give player gnomes an increased skill cap with clubs, due to their perceived affinity with the aklys. Specific variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 and earlier versions may not include the ability to tether an aklys and use it as a long-range weapon introduced in NetHack 3.6.1.

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM adds two new items that use the club skill: the baseball bat and the torch.

A club can be upgraded into an aklys, and vice versa; SLASH'EM does not alter the aklys from NetHack 3.4.3.

The club skill is considerably more useful in SLASH'EM due to the addition of two endgame-quality artifacts that use it:

  • Skullcrusher is a lawful artifact club that serves as the guaranteed first sacrifice gift for Cavepeople, and does a flat +10 damage to all monsters.
  • The Bat from Hell is a chaotic artifact baseball bat that serves as the guaranteed first for Rogues, and does a flat +20 damage against all monsters.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, all player dwarves begin the game with a wooden club that staves can be carved into, as well as a knife to carve with. Clubs can also be used to make torches by dipping them into a potion of oil.

Living lecterns leave behind 2-6 clubs as part of their special death drop instead of a corpse.

NetHack Fourk

In NetHack Fourk, player gnomes have increased skill caps in clubs.

The Big Stick is a chaotic artifact club that replaces The Sceptre of Might as the Caveman quest artifact.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, the Big Stick also replaces The Sceptre of Might as the Caveman quest artifact.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a club can be combined with a rubber hose at a furnace to create a baseball bat.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, Keolewa is a neutral artifact club that acts as the first sacrifice gift artifact for Cavepeople.

A club can be created at a forge by combining 2 arrows and 2 crossbow bolts. A club can be used to forge a couple of items:

  • A club can be combined with a dagger to create a mace.
  • A club can be combined with a flail to create an akyls.

Player giants wielding a club have a chance of stunning any monsters they hit with it.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, the metal club is a new weapon that uses the club skill, and deals the most damage among non-artifact clubs.

Petslayer is a chaotic artifact club that has +5 to-hit and deals +10 damage against domestic animals.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, Skullcrusher and the Bat from Hell from SLASH'EM appear as artifacts along with Keolewa from EvilHack.

A club can be upgraded into an aklys and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM. Clubs can also be dipped in oil to make torches, as in dNetHack.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 52
  2. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 433
  3. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 389
  4. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 185
  5. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 183

'''棍棒'''（club）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[武器]]。它由[[木头]]制成。

== 生成 ==
棍棒在随机生成武器中占比1.2%。

[[穴居人]]会在游戏开始时获得一把[[附魔|+1]]棍棒{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|52|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[食人魔（怪物类别）|食人魔]]类怪物生成时有概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一把棍棒：[[食人魔]]为{{frac|11|12}}，[[食人魔领主]]为{{frac|5|6}}，[[食人魔王]]为{{frac|2|3}}{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|433|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[吉斯通警察（怪物类别）|吉斯通警察]]类怪物有{{frac|6}}在生成时获得棍棒{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|389|nethack=3.6.7}}。[[双头巨人]]生成时总是携带棍棒{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|185|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

所有[[玩家怪物]]有约1%的概率获得棍棒作为起始武器。[[穴居人（玩家怪物）|穴居人]]职业的玩家怪物有{{frac|8}}的概率在生成时获得棍棒{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|183|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|根据{{commit|20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e|commit 20cbadc}}，现在[[萨满卡诺夫]]会在生成时获得一把+5棍棒。

根据{{commit|e5c73d01fefff13d49d9af83a52615dfe20e2699|commit e5c73d0}}，现在[[木魔像]]的[[死亡掉落]]中可能会出现棍棒。}}

== 棍棒技能 ==
{{club skill table/zh-CN}}

棍棒和[[链棒]]使用棍棒技能。游戏中不存在[[神器武器|神器]]类棍棒。

棍棒技能是唯一一种[[游客]]职业的角色不能锻炼的技能。

== 策略 ==
棍棒对于穴居人是不错的前期武器，但游戏中有不少攻击性能比棍棒强得多的武器可以选择。值得注意的是，链棒虽然和棍棒攻击力相同，但是能够进行远程攻击，而且掷出后可以自动返回，因此能够取代诸如[[投石器]]之类的远程武器，甚至可以在获得神器之前作为主武器使用。

== 历史 ==
棍棒最初于[[NetHack 1.3d]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
Some variants give player [[Gnome (starting race)|gnomes]] an increased skill cap with clubs, due to their perceived affinity with the aklys. Specific variants based on [[NetHack 3.4.3]] and earlier versions may not include the ability to tether an aklys and use it as a long-range weapon introduced in [[NetHack 3.6.1]].

===SLASH'EM===
[[SLASH'EM]] adds two new items that use the club skill: the [[baseball bat]] and the [[torch]].

A club can be [[upgraded]] into an aklys, and vice versa; SLASH'EM does not alter the aklys from NetHack 3.4.3.

The club skill is considerably more useful in SLASH'EM due to the addition of two endgame-quality [[artifact]]s that use it:

* [[Skullcrusher]] is a lawful artifact club that serves as the guaranteed first [[sacrifice gift]] for Cavepeople, and does a flat +10 damage to all monsters.
* The [[Bat from Hell]] is a chaotic artifact baseball bat that serves as the guaranteed first for [[Rogue]]s, and does a flat +20 damage against all monsters.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], all player [[Dwarf (starting race)|dwarves]] begin the game with a wooden club that [[stave]]s can be carved into, as well as a [[knife]] to carve with. Clubs can also be used to make torches by [[dip]]ping them into a [[potion of oil]].

[[Living lectern]]s leave behind 2-6 clubs as part of their special death drop instead of a corpse.

===NetHack Fourk===
In [[NetHack Fourk]], player gnomes have increased skill caps in clubs.

The [[Big Stick]] is a chaotic artifact club that replaces [[The Sceptre of Might]] as the Caveman [[quest artifact]].

===xNetHack===
In [[xNetHack]], the Big Stick also replaces The Sceptre of Might as the Caveman quest artifact.

===SpliceHack===
In [[SpliceHack]], a club can be combined with a [[rubber hose]] at a [[furnace]] to create a baseball bat.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], Keolewa is a neutral artifact club that acts as the first sacrifice gift artifact for Cavepeople.

A club can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining 2 [[arrow]]s and 2 [[crossbow bolt]]s. A club can be used to forge a couple of items:

* A club can be combined with a [[dagger]] to create a [[mace]].
* A club can be combined with a [[flail]] to create an akyls.

Player [[Giant (starting race)|giants]] wielding a club have a chance of [[stun]]ning any monsters they hit with it.

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, the [[metal club]] is a new weapon that uses the club skill, and deals the most damage among non-artifact clubs.

[[Petslayer]] is a chaotic artifact club that has +5 to-hit and deals +10 damage against [[domestic animal]]s.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], Skullcrusher and the Bat from Hell from SLASH'EM appear as artifacts along with Keolewa from EvilHack.

A club can be upgraded into an aklys and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM. Clubs can also be dipped in oil to make torches, as in dNetHack.
